name: Vehicle
description: Vehicles are wheeled entities which Characters can possesses and drive.

constructor.name: auto_create_physics
constructor.description: Can be disabled to improve performance when setting several configs. Must call RecreatePhysics() after all

constructor.name: auto_unflip
constructor.description: Auto rotates the vehicle if flipped

functions.name: AddStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Spawns and Attaches a StaticMesh into this Vehicle
functions.description_long:
Spawns and Attaches a StaticMesh into this Vehicle in a Socket with relative Location and Rotation. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing it further

For customizing the Materials specific of a StaticMeshAttached, please use the following syntax as the parameter_name in the Paintable methods: attachable///[ATTACHABLE_ID]/[PARAMETER_NAME], where [ATTACHABLE_ID] is the ID of the Attachable, and [PARAMETER_NAME] is the name of the parameter you want to change.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Used further for removing or applying material settings on it

functions.name: Horn
functions.description: Starts or stops the vehicles horn

functions.name: RecreatePhysics
functions.description: Recreate the Vehicle Physics
functions.description_long: Call this after configuring the vehicle if passed auto_create_physics to constructor

functions.name: RemoveStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if existing, a StaticMesh from this Vehicle given it's custom ID

functions.name: RemoveAllStaticMeshesAttached
functions.description: Removes all StaticMeshes attached

functions.name: SetAutoStartEngine
functions.description: Sets if the Engine auto starts when the driver enters the Vehicle

functions.name: SetEngineStarted
functions.description: Sets if the Engine is turned off/on
functions.description_long: Sets if the Engine is turned off/on (this will affect Lights, Sounds and ability to Throttle)

functions.name: SetDifferentialSetup
functions.description: Configures the Vehicle Differential

parameters.name: front_rear_split
parameters.description:
Ratio of torque split between front and rear
bigger than 0.5 means more to front
lower than 0.5 means more to rear (works only with 4W type)

parameters.name: front_left_right_split
parameters.description:
Ratio of torque split between front-left and front-right
bigger than 0.5 means more to front-left
lower than 0.5 means more to front-right (works only with 4W and LimitedSlip_FrontDrive)

parameters.name: rear_left_right_split
parameters.description:
Ratio of torque split between rear-left and rear-right
bigger than 0.5 means more to rear-left
lower than 0.5 means more to rear-right (works only with 4W and LimitedSlip_RearDrive)

parameters.name: center_bias
parameters.description: Maximum allowed ratio of average front wheel rotation speed and rear wheel rotation speeds Acceptable range: 1 .. infinite (works only with LimitedSlip_4W)

parameters.name: front_bias
parameters.description: Maximum allowed ratio of front-left and front-right wheel rotation speeds Acceptable range: 1 .. infinite (works only with LimitedSlip_4W, LimitedSlip_FrontDrive)

parameters.name: rear_bias
parameters.description: Maximum allowed ratio of rear-left and rear-right wheel rotation speeds Acceptable range: 1 .. infinite (works only with LimitedSlip_4W, LimitedSlip_FrontDrive)

functions.name: SetEngineSetup
functions.description: Configures the Vehicle Engine (Torque, RPM, Braking)

parameters.name: max_torque
parameters.description: Max Engine Torque (Nm) is multiplied by TorqueCurve

parameters.name: max_rpm
parameters.description: Maximum revolutions per minute of the engine

parameters.name: idle_rpm
parameters.description: Idle RMP of engine then in neutral/stationary

parameters.name: brake_effect
parameters.description: Braking effect from engine, when throttle released

parameters.name: rev_up_moi
parameters.description: Affects how fast the engine RPM speed up

parameters.name: rev_down_rate
parameters.description: Affects how fast the engine RPM slows down

functions.name: SetAerodynamicsSetup
functions.description: Configures the Vehicle Aerodynamics Settings

parameters.name: mass
parameters.description: Mass of the vehicle chassis

parameters.name: drag_coefficient
parameters.description: Force resisting forward motion at speed

parameters.name: vehicle_chassis_width
parameters.description: Chassis width used for drag force computation (cm)

parameters.name: vehicle_chassis_height
parameters.description: Chassis height used for drag force computation (cm)

parameters.name: vehicle_downforce_coefficient
parameters.description: Force pressing vehicle into ground at speed

parameters.name: center_of_mass_override
parameters.description: Overrides the center of mass. Good for curves stabilization

functions.name: SetTransmissionSetup
functions.description: Configures the Vehicle Transmission

parameters.name: transmission_final_ratio
parameters.description: The final gear ratio multiplies the transmission gear ratios

parameters.name: transmission_change_up_rpm
parameters.description: Engine Revs at which gear up change ocurrs

parameters.name: transmission_change_down_rpm
parameters.description: Engine Revs at which gear down change ocurrs

parameters.name: transmission_gear_change_time
parameters.description: Time it takes to switch gears (seconds)

parameters.name: transmission_efficiency
parameters.description: Mechanical frictional losses mean transmission might operate at 0.94 (94% efficiency)

functions.name: SetWheel
functions.description: Configures a Vehicle Wheel
functions.description_long: Wheels can be updated in runtime by calling SetWheel again, you can for example change the suspension high or disable a wheel totally by toggling affected_by_engine off or setting radius to 0.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the wheel (0-N). Set it in ASC order

parameters.name: bone_name
parameters.description: Name of the bone to attach this wheel to

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of the wheel

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the wheel

parameters.name: max_steer_angle
parameters.description: Steer angle in degrees for this wheel

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: If bone_name is specified, offset the wheel from the bone's location. Otherwise this offsets the wheel from the vehicle's origin

parameters.name: is_affected_by_engine
parameters.description: Whether engine should power this wheel

parameters.name: is_affected_by_brake
parameters.description: Whether brake should affect this wheel

parameters.name: is_affected_by_handbrake
parameters.description: Whether handbrake should affect this wheel

parameters.name: has_abs_enabled
parameters.description: Advanced Braking System Enabled

parameters.name: has_traction_control_enabled
parameters.description: Straight Line Traction Control Enabled

parameters.name: max_brake_torque
parameters.description: Max brake torque for this wheel (Nm)

parameters.name: max_handbrake_torque
parameters.description: Max handbrake brake torque for this wheel (Nm). A handbrake should have a stronger brake torque than the brake

parameters.name: cornering_stiffness
parameters.description: Tyre Cornering Ability

parameters.name: side_slip_modifier
parameters.description: Wheel Lateral Skid Grip Loss, lower number less grip on skid

parameters.name: friction_force_multiplier
parameters.description: Friction Force Multiplier

parameters.name: slip_threshold
parameters.description: Wheel Longitudinal Slip Threshold

parameters.name: skid_threshold
parameters.description: Wheel Lateral Skid Threshold

parameters.name: suspension_spring_rate
parameters.description: Spring Force (N/m)

parameters.name: suspension_spring_preload
parameters.description: Spring Preload (N/m)

parameters.name: suspension_max_raise
parameters.description: How far the wheel can go above the resting position

parameters.name: suspension_max_drop
parameters.description: How far the wheel can drop below the resting position

parameters.name: suspension_smoothing
parameters.description: Smooth suspension [0-off, 10-max] - Warning might cause momentary visual inter-penetration of the wheel against objects/terrain

parameters.name: suspension_damping_ratio
parameters.description: Suspension damping, larger value causes the suspension to come to rest faster [range 0 to 1]

parameters.name: suspension_wheel_load_ratio
parameters.description:
Amount wheel load effects wheel friction.
- At 0 wheel friction is completely independent of the loading on the wheel (This is artificial as it always assumes even balance between all wheels)
- At 1 wheel friction is based on the force pressing wheel into the ground. This is more realistic.
- Lower value cures lift off over-steer, generally makes vehicle easier to handle under extreme motions.

parameters.name: suspension_axis
parameters.description: Local body direction in which where suspension forces are applied (typically along -Z-axis)

parameters.name: suspension_force_offset
parameters.description: Vertical offset from where suspension forces are applied (along Z-axis)

functions.name: SetDoor
functions.description: Adds a Door to the Vehicle
functions.description_long: Adds a Door at offset_location from root which will pose the Character at seat_location with seat_rotation rotation.

parameters.name: leave_lateral_offset
parameters.description: It's where the Character will be ejected when leaving it (e.g. -150 for left door or 150 for right door)

functions.name: SetSteeringWheelSetup
functions.description: Configures where the Steering Wheel is located
functions.description_long: Configures where the Steering Wheel is located, so Characters can grab it procedurally properly

functions.name: SetHeadlightsSetup
functions.description: Configures the Headlights Offset and Color.

functions.name: SetTaillightsSetup
functions.description: Configures the Taillights Offset.

functions.name: GetAssetName
functions.description: Gets the Asset name

functions.name: GetBoneTransform
functions.description: Gets a Bone Transform in world space given a bone name

functions.name: GetPassenger
functions.description: Gets a passenger from a seat

return.description: or nil if no passenger in seat

functions.name: GetPassengers
functions.description: Gets all passengers

functions.name: GetRPM
functions.description: Gets the current RPM

functions.name: GetGear
functions.description: Gets the current Gear

arguments.name: impact_force
arguments.description: The intensity of the Hit normalized by the Vehicle's weight

arguments.name: impact_location
arguments.description: The world 3D location of the impact

arguments.name: velocity
arguments.description: The Vehicle velocity at the moment it hits

events.name: CharacterEntered
events.description: Triggered when a Character fully enters the Vehicle

events.name: CharacterLeft
events.description: Triggered when a Character fully leaves the Vehicle

events.name: CharacterAttemptEnter
events.description: Triggered when a Character attempts to enter the Vehicle

events.name: CharacterAttemptLeave
events.description: Triggered when a Character attempts to leave the Vehicle

events.name: TakeDamage
events.description: Triggered when this Vehicle takes damage

arguments.name: from_direction
arguments.description: Direction of the damage relative to the damaged actor

arguments.name: instigator
arguments.description: The player which caused the damage

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

return.description: Return false to cancel the damage (will still display animations, particles and apply impact forces)
